short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extend the features of e2time.com with this chrome extension. Manage your clock in / clock out or track your task time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extend the features of e2time.com with this chrome extension. You could now authenticate from your e2time website session. Then you could manage more easily your work time by doing clock in/ clock out or time tracking your tasks.
